publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3977 Johann Lamont: Welcome to Age Concern and Help the Aged in Scotland—That the Parliament welcomes the merger of Age Concern Scotland and Help the Aged in Scotland; congratulates both organisations on joining forces to support older people by providing services and campaigning on the issues that impact on the lives of older people, and recognises the contribution that the merged organisation will make in supporting older people to meet the challenges of combating fuel poverty and securing high quality services, including appropriate personal care, transport and housing.
S3M-3977 Welcome to Age Concern and Help the Aged in Scotland (lodged on 24 April 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Mike Pringle*
S3M-3977 Welcome to Age Concern and Help the Aged in Scotland (lodged on 24 April 2009) Tom McCabe*

S3M-3977 Welcome to Age Concern and Help the Aged in Scotland (lodged on 24 April 2009) Rhoda Grant*, Karen Whitefield*, Marlyn Glen*, Robert Brown*, Elaine Smith*, Kenneth Gibson*, Duncan McNeil*, Karen Gillon*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Claire Baker*, Richard Baker*, Jamie McGrigor*, Gil Paterson*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Robin Harper*, Bob Doris*, Ken Macintosh*, Patricia Ferguson*, Trish Godman*, Elaine Murray*, Hugh O’Donnell*, John Park*
S3M-3977 Welcome to Age Concern and Help the Aged in Scotland (lodged on 24 April 2009) Stuart McMillan*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Brian Adam*, Jackie Baillie*, Margaret Curran*, Ross Finnie*
S3M-3977 Welcome to Age Concern and Help the Aged in Scotland (lodged on 24 April 2009) Liam McArthur*
S3M-3977 Welcome to Age Concern and Help the Aged in Scotland (lodged on 24 April 2009) Hugh Henry*
S3M-3977 Welcome to Age Concern and Help the Aged in Scotland (lodged on 24 April 2009) Sarah Boyack*
